WORK FOR SLEEKNOTE AS AN

Online Marketing Intern

Aarhus, Denmark

Apply For This Role

Imagine, for a moment, that it’s the first day of your internship. 

Your new manager greets you, gift basket in hand, before showing you to your own desk…

You’re introduced to the Marketing team and onboarded with fun, easy-to-follow videos made to facilitate fast-learning…

You bond with your fellow interns and colleagues over a delicious catered lunch…

From there, you’re given full responsibility for your tasks and room to grow—personally and professionally—in areas where your best strengths lie.

This isn’t a dream. Nor is it a luxury afforded only to big tech companies like Facebook or Google… 

It’s a typical first day of an internship at Sleeknote.

But don’t take our word for it. Listen to what others interns have to say about their time with the company:

What Is It Like Being An Intern at Sleeknote?

Why Intern at Sleeknote?

Sleeknote is a software company that helps retailers engage their online visitors using intelligent website popups. 

With more than 1,800 customers in 47 countries, Sleeknote offers a range of solutions that help online retailers—like Boozt, Miinto, and Imerco—turn their website visitors into customers. 

We’re a fun, vibrant company that employs people from all walks of life and more than half a dozen countries. 

But we’re not for everyone.

If you’re looking for a paid placement… or an internship that’s built on boring, recurring work… 

We’re likely not a good match. 

But if you’re looking for an internship that promises:

  • Ongoing responsibilities for tasks that impact the company’s growth;
  • Monthly events like playing board games; 
  • Catered lunches every day; and
  • A glowing recommendation from our CMO. Plus, a potential full-time job with one of more than 200 carefully-chosen partners…

Then keep reading…

Because we have an internship program that’s perfect for you.

Want to Become Sleeknote’s Next Online Marketing Intern?

We’re looking for an online marketing intern with a passion for all things digital marketing-related.

During this internship, you’ll work closely with our marketing team and learn how to:

  • Assist the marketing team with various projects;
  • Conduct research for new link building strategies;
  • Manage and plan content creation;
  • Research and create new internal and external marketing resources;
  • Manage translations of our content and email marketing.

And more.

To be successful, you must have a flair for creativity, an eye for detail, and a ridiculously good work ethic. The program starts in August 2021 in Aarhus, Denmark, and runs for five to six months depending on your course requirements.

How Do I Apply?

To apply for the position, and become part of the Sleeknote family, click “Apply.”

If you have any questions about the job, feel free to contact Emil (CMO) at ek@sleeknote.com.

Apply

Value #1

We Iterate to Success

Success isn’t a straight line. We acknowledge our mistakes and learn from them to move us closer to where we want to go.

Value #2

We Encourage Growth

We invite employees to become the best version of themselves, both personally and professionally.

Value #3

We Go The Extra Mile

It’s easy to settle for mediocrity. We believe in going above and beyond, whether that’s solving internal challenges or serving our customers.

What We’re All About

Sleeknote helps your favorite e-commerce brands engage website visitors—without hurting the user experience. When we founded Sleeknote in 2014, there were several lead generation tools on the market. But few, if any, gave savvy e-commerce marketers the flexibility to engage their site visitors on their terms. We like to think we changed that.
